page.title: 13HORSE RIDING CLUB.
page.content: The horse riding club is held in the stables. Matron takes us there. There are quite a lot of horses there, I ride one called Baford, he is quite big. We have two groups with about eight people in each. It is very good fun. We sometimes have tests how to brush and pick out the bit of dirt in its hoof and things like that. We do not do jumping most of the time we either just walk round trot or canter sometines we do the steering of the horse and sometimes we play games or races. When I first went I didn't know anything I had never been on a horse and since then they have taught me a lot. Sometimes also we go out on the horses. The horse riding stable is not very far away, it is down the drive and around the corner near the bus stop. I think it is excellent.
